text: Data was processed using RMA normalization and analysis using R (performed by Johannes Hanson) ID_REF =  VALUE = Robust Multichip Average (RMA) value were used according to the standard Affymetrix protocol (

protocol.text: Tracheary element differentiation was triggered by incubating 7-days old cells into fresh MS liquid medium pH 5.7 b5 vitamins 3% sucrose complmented with 6µg/ml NAA, 1µg/ml BAP and 4µM epibrassinolides (see Pesquet et al., Current Biology 2010 for details).
Arabidopsis habituated cell suspension cultures were grown in 1x MS liquid pH 5.7 complemented with b5 vitamins and 3% sucrose
Total RNA were extracted from frozen cell cultures using the Trizol reagent methods - repeated twice (according to manufacturer's instruction)

text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared from total RNA according to the standard Affymetrix protocol (
15µg of cRNA were hybridized for 16h at 45°C and then wahsed in GeneChip Fluidics Station 450 according to the standard Affymetrix protocol (
Scanning was performed using GeneChip 3000 according to the standard Affymetrix protocol (
